page.title: 12Fordham Parish Council
page.content: At the top is the Government. Then the County Council, Borough Council, and finally the Parish Council. The Parish Council looks after{local {affairs.}Fordham council has seven members. These were elected. The council has a{budget}each year, and the members decide how to spend the money, which they get from an extra rate they add to the ordinary rates. Each year they donate two hundred pounds to help care for the church yard. They also have to spend a lot of money repairing damage done by {vandals,}so money can't be spent on providing extras for the village. They own the{bus shelter}and the {playing field}on behalf of the village. The playing field was given as a gift to the village, and it would have cost eight thousand pounds to buy.
